title: Coronavirus: LA county gun shops to reopen as 'essential' business
description: The policy reversal follows a federal advisory deeming gun stores as essential services.
content:
Image copyrightGetty ImagesImage caption
 Customers queue outside a LA county gun shop
Los Angeles County is reopening gun shops to the public after a federal memo listed them as "essential" businesses.
Sheriff Alex Villanueva closed shops last week, but r… [+2147 chars]
